title: Trolls in ranked
body:
I was in champ select in ranked and got top my mains was banned and they picked swain (which was another one of my mains)
so I picked teemo top and my jungler said "teemo top? fk this Im trolling" and picked blitzcrank jungle.
so I dodged and I lost some Lp and got the penalty.
 I wasn't even doing anything thing wrong in fact I probably saved my whole team from losing Lp.

replies.body: this zil brought 6 rod of ages and teliported to every land and fed

You should be punished for picking teemo into swain. Ofc the blitz shouldn't have trolled, but i personally would've dodged and be mad i lost LP for your decision. Teemo can be a good pick,  but only vs a very small amount of very specific champions.

I have a main too, if it gets banned however, i always have 2-3 champs to fall back on (although cho'god is never really banned or picked). I suggest you do the same. Don't tunnelvision yourself by playing just 1-2 champions. Have a backup.

Get used to it.

Riot doesn't care, as long as you all buy champs and spend money.

Solution, boycott buying RP.
